articles.title: Robson Street's shopping options continue to grow
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Brunette the Label has opened a pop-up store on Robson Street in Vancouver, featuring its full fashion line until December 15. Roots revealed its expanded flagship location at 919 Robson St., showcasing a new retail design. Arc'teryx also unveiled a new Vancouver flagship store, offering outdoor gear and an interactive map of local trails.

articles.title: 35 Mundane But Extremely Useful Items Future You Would High-Five You For Buying
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article highlights several newly available products, including a Finish dishwasher cleaner, a Bounce wrinkle release spray in travel size, and duster sponges. Additionally, it mentions a Frida Baby rinse cup for babies and limited edition wildflower Band-Aids as well as an on-the-go Gillette razor, antibacterial paper soap sheets and LeakLocks Toiletry Skins to prevent leaks.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy XR: Vision Pro's Biggest Rival?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy XR headset, the first to run Android XR, co-developed with Google. The headset integrates Gemini AI and features dual micro-OLED panels with higher sharpness than Apple's Vision Pro. It comes with bundled services like YouTube Premium and Google Play Pass.

articles.title: /C O R R E C T I O N -- nubia/
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: nubia has launched the nubia Z80 Ultra, a new smartphone with advanced features. It is globally available and delivers elite gaming and revolutionary photography via Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5. The overseas version will be officially launched on November 6th and available for purchase on November 18th.

articles.title: Leveraging Content Distribution Networks to Enhance SEO and Advertising Performance
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Rhino Web Studios highlights the importance of Content Distribution Networks (CDNs) in modern SEO and digital advertising. CDNs enhance website speed, improve search rankings, and increase ad conversion rates by delivering website data from geographically close servers. This leads to better user experience, higher ad quality scores, and improved brand credibility.

articles.title: New LG-Ecobank deal powers smart home revolution
articles.author: Arinze Nwafor
articles.summary: LG Electronics Nigeria and Ecobank Nigeria have partnered to launch LG's new AI-powered Smart TVs (OLED, QNED, NanoCell, and UHD models powered by LG ThinQ AI) and other home appliances in Nigeria. Ecobank will provide flexible payment plans through its Easy Monthly Instalment scheme, making the technology more accessible to a wider range of consumers. LG showcased these new products including the LG SIGNATURE OLED TV at the press conference.

articles.title: Consider These 38 Highly-Rated Products *Vounched For*
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article features several new products. Eos launched Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil with vanilla, musk, and caramel scents. Juno & Co. released Clean 10 Cleansing Balm made with pearl barley and vitamin E. Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, and Burt's Bees has Burt's Bees sunburn soother crafted with aloe and coconut oil.

articles.title: The luxe Augustinus Bader Advent calendar is the ultimate skincare splurge
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Augustinus Bader is launching the "12 Days of Bader Advent Calendar for 2025", a limited-edition set featuring 12 of the brand's popular skincare products in travel sizes, including The Rich Cream and The Retinol Serum. The calendar retails for $675 and includes items like The Cream Cleansing Gel, The Essence, The Serum, and The Eye Cream.

articles.title: Top AI-Powered Solutions for Human-Like Text Generation
articles.author: Stephanie Maris
articles.summary: Humaniser.ai is introduced as an AI-powered text humanizer that refines AI-written content to sound more authentic and emotional. Several other AI writing tools, including Writesonic, Jasper.ai, Copy.ai, Wordtune, and Anyword, are compared based on their strengths in marketing, business content, brainstorming, rewriting, and data-driven optimization, respectively. Humaniser.ai is presented as a tool that complements these platforms by adding a human touch to AI-generated text.

articles.title: OpenAI Wants to Cure Cancer. So Why Did It Make a Web Browser?
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Atlas, a new AI-powered web browser that integrates ChatGPT directly into the browsing experience. Atlas features an 'Ask ChatGPT' button on every webpage and an 'agent' mode where ChatGPT can use the web for users, for example, researching and booking vacations. The browser aims to bring ChatGPT deeper into people's lives and make AI more accessible.

articles.title: OpenAI has slipped shopping into 800 million ChatGPT users' chats
articles.author: Yuanyuan Cui
articles.summary: OpenAI and Stripe launched the Agentic Commerce Protocol on September 29, 2025, which enables instant purchases from Etsy within ChatGPT conversations. ChatGPT users are slated to gain access to over 1 million Shopify merchants. Google also announced its competing protocol, AP2, with Microsoft, Amazon, and Meta developing similar AI shopping systems.

articles.title: JoJo Ventures Launches JifChat -- The AI Design Agent That Ends Prompt Frustration for Sellers, Marketers, Brands, and Creators
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: JoJo Ventures has launched JifChat, an AI design agent designed for sellers, marketers, brands, and creators. JifChat offers features like Workflow system and In-Chat Image Interaction. JifChat is available at www.jif.dev with free trials.

articles.title: Roborock F25 Ultra review: A powerful steam vac-mop that deep cleans my floors better than anything I've tried
articles.author: Lauren Savoie
articles.summary: Roborock has introduced the F25 Ultra, a new-generation vac-mop that vacuums, mops, and offers steam cleaning. This product combines multiple cleaning devices into one and features various cleaning modes, self-cleaning functionality, and app-based customization. The F25 Ultra delivers powerful suction and deep cleaning performance, making it a standout for homes with hard floors.

articles.title: Samsung's New Foldable Phone Will Make You Rethink a Single-Screen
articles.author: Kimberly Gedeon
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7, the company's new foldable phone, boasts improvements in bulk and battery life. It features larger displays, a slimmer frame, and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 has a 200MP main camera that captures more detail than the iPhone 16 Pro Max.

articles.title: Score rare Dyson deals on the Airwrap, Supersonic and other editor-loved hair tools
articles.author: Jacqueline Saguin
articles.summary: Dyson is offering discounts on several of its hair care products, including the Airwrap, Supersonic, Airstrait and Corrale straightener. The latest Dyson Supersonic r and Dyson Airwrap i.d. multi-styler are also on sale for the first time since launching. The Dyson Supersonic Origin was launched in 2023 as a more affordable option.

articles.title: ‘Dirty soda' is all the rage. Swig bets Coca-Cola's hometown will love it.
org: Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
articles.summary: Swig, a national dirty soda chain, plans to open locations in the Atlanta area by fall of 2026. PepsiCo is also planning to launch "Dirty Mountain Dew" cream soda in 2026, indicating a growing trend and expansion of dirty soda products in the beverage market.

articles.title: Star-studded Lagos event marks debut of OPPO A6 Pro
articles.author: David Agba
articles.summary: OPPO has launched the OPPO A6 Pro smartphone in Nigeria, featuring a 7,000mAh battery, 80W SUPERVOOC Flash Charge, and military-grade durability. The phone offers a 120Hz AMOLED display, ColorOS 15, and is available in 8GB+128GB and 8GB+256GB models across authorized retail outlets and e-commerce platforms nationwide.

articles.title: Snapchat Expands Access to its Open Prompt AI Lens
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Snapchat has launched its 'Imagine' Lens, an AI-powered feature that allows users to re-create and re-contextualize their Snaps through conversational prompts. The Imagine Lens is available to all Snapchatters in the U.S. and is expanding to international markets like Canada, Great Britain, and Australia. Users can find it in the Lens Carousel or search for it by name in the Snapchat app.

articles.title: REMIXED Publishes New Article on Innovations in 3D Printing for Design and Marketing
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: REMIXED, a branding agency, announced the publication of a new article, 'Innovations in 3D Printing for Design and Marketing.' The article explores how 3D printing technologies are transforming creative industries. The article highlights how 3D printing continues to reshape design and marketing, offering limitless opportunities for innovation and audience connection.

articles.title: REMIXED Publishes New Article on Innovations in 3D Printing for Design and Marketing
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: REMIXED agency announced the publication of a new article, 'Innovations in 3D Printing for Design and Marketing,' exploring how 3D printing technologies transform creative industries. The company leverages 3D printing to provide customized products, rapid prototyping, and enhanced marketing materials, bringing brand stories to life through sensory and spatial design.

articles.title: How to cheaply disinfect and clean your phone without harsh chemicals
articles.author: MORIBA CUMMINGS
articles.summary: The article highlights several products for cleaning and sanitizing phones. These include cleaning solutions like Vi-Jon Swan Isopropyl Alcohol and Clorox Disinfecting Wipes, and UV sanitizers like Simplehuman Cleanstation and PhoneSoap Basic. The article details how to use these products and their effectiveness in removing germs and bacteria from phones.

articles.title: PSA: I found a top-tier Dyson hair dryer for 30% off on Amazon right now
articles.author: Ashley Morris
articles.summary: The Dyson Supersonic Origin hair dryer is available on Amazon with a discount of almost 30%. It uses intelligent heat control and multiple settings for customizable drying and styling, and comes with one attachment and is compatible with other Dyson accessories.

articles.title: New Zone Holdings expands island-wide presence with Kandy branch opening
articles.summary: New Zone Holdings (Pvt) Ltd, a distributor of car care products, workshop tools, and equipment, has opened a new branch in Kandy, Sri Lanka. The opening signifies an expansion of their services and commitment to serving customers across the island.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventors Develop No Sweat Underarm Pads (LOS-380)
articles.author: Invent Help
articles.summary: Inventors from Norwalk, CA, created 'NO SWEAT UNDER ARM PADS.' This new product absorbs perspiration and prevents odors. The pads aim to keep users comfortable and dry, acting as a barrier between odor and perspiration when deodorant use is not possible.

articles.title: Sick of AI slop on Pinterest? You can filter it out now
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Pinterest has introduced a new AI content tuner. Users can now try this new feature, although initial results are mixed.

articles.title: LIVESTREAMED: Launch of GhanaWeb Excellence Awards 2025
articles.summary: GhanaWeb launched the GhanaWeb Excellence Awards on October 22, 2025. The awards scheme will honor individuals, brands, and institutions shaping Ghana's future. Details about nominations, categories, and the official date were announced at the launch.

articles.title: LIVESTREAMING: Launch of GhanaWeb Excellence Awards 2025
articles.summary: GhanaWeb is launching its annual awards scheme, the GhanaWeb Excellence Awards, on October 22, 2025. The awards will honor individuals, brands, and institutions shaping Ghana's future. The launch details including nomination process and award categories will be announced.

articles.title: Smart Beds Had Strange Tech Issues During AWS Outage
articles.summary: Eight Sleep's smart beds malfunctioned due to an AWS outage, causing unexpected behavior such as alarms, flashing lights, and inability to adjust positions. CEO Matteo Franceschetti issued an apology, and the company is working on an 'outage-proof mode' for the beds.

articles.title: Coles makes it debut in Dalyellup with new store
articles.summary: Coles has launched a new store in Dalyellup. This marks Coles' debut in the Dalyellup region.

articles.title: Apple : à Paris, la marque à la pomme croque dans le design
articles.author: Pierre Groppo
articles.summary: An apparel company is launching a new line of high-end baby clothes. The company is using an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents to target advertising within partner apps. The profiles are built on data related to income and recent childbirth to present advertising of the new baby clothes to the suitable customers.

articles.title: How to get 50% off Mint Mobile plus a Google Pixel 10 Pro for $499
articles.author: Sarah Saril
articles.summary: Mint Mobile is offering discounts on the Google Pixel 10 Pro and Pixel 10 Pro XL. Customers can save $500 on the Google Pixel 10 Pro and $600 on the Pixel 10 Pro XL when purchased with a year of Mint Mobile service. All Mint Mobile plans are currently priced at $15 per month as part of the promotion.

articles.title: Nubia Z80 Ultra unveiled in China, will be available globally in November
articles.author: Pratyay
articles.summary: Nubia unveiled the Z80 Ultra in China, with a global launch scheduled for November 6. This flagship device features a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, a 7200mAh battery, a 6.85-inch AMOLED screen, and a triple rear camera setup. The phone's price starts at CNY 4999 ($701) for the 12GB RAM + 512GB storage configuration.

articles.title: Authenticity Is Vital For CMOs As Brands Seek Meaningful Connections
articles.author: Megan Poinski
articles.summary: Ernie Ross, founder of Ross | ReThink, is releasing his new book next week titled "Intangience: How Human Connection Creates Value Between People, Brands and Ideologies." The book discusses the importance of authenticity and human connection in building relationships between customers and brands.

articles.title: Lululemon secures a trademark registration for 'Lululemon Dupe.'
articles.author: Sarah Jeong
articles.summary: Lululemon has secured a trademark registration for 'Lululemon Dupe.' This registration aims to protect Lululemon's products from similar unaffiliated products or unauthorized copies, representing a strategic move in combating product imitation.

articles.title: InventHelp Inventor Develops Smart Message Display Device (LOS-253)
articles.author: Invent Help
articles.summary: An inventor created AD LIGHT, a new display device intended for both personal and commercial applications. The device allows users to easily change the visual display or message.

articles.title: Fractionally Launches Marketing Genie, Its Second AI Tool for Startups and SMBs
articles.author: Amilcar Chavarria
articles.summary: Fractionally has launched Marketing Genie, an AI-native growth platform that helps startups and SMBs turn one input, like an idea or website, into meetings, content, and measurable pipeline. Within a week of its release, Marketing Genie has onboarded five paying customers and built a strong pipeline and waitlist for its onboarding program.

articles.title: Unlock Customer Insights with Standupcode's Text Mining API
articles.summary: Standupcode by Lodash Thailand has launched its Text Mining API, an advanced tool designed to make text analysis more accessible for businesses. The API integrates with multiple platforms and offers features like sentiment analysis, automatic categorization, and profanity detection, supporting both Thai and English languages. It empowers businesses to monitor customer behavior, track brand sentiment, and categorize complaints efficiently.

articles.title: Spain's Nude Project Is Ready to Go Global
articles.summary: Nude Project is introducing a new collection featuring items like the Juicy Cherry T-shirt, Gradient Knit Hoodie, and Iconic Puffer Jacket. The brand is expanding its presence to the U.S. market, opening new stores internationally, including one in Germany, and planning collaborations with influential artists.

articles.title: The Secret to Perfect Espresso? A Clean Machine Every Time
articles.author: Sarah Connor
articles.summary: Breville, De'Longhi and Nespresso espresso machine require regular cleaning to ensure the best performance and longevity. Breville machine has a 'Clean Me' light that illuminates after a set number of cycles and Nespresso machines tend to handle the internal work for the user. Most brands recommend changing out the water filter often as well.

articles.title: Xmind Reinvents Itself: From Mind Mapping Pioneer to Lightweight Project Management Innovator
articles.summary: Xmind has launched a new platform extending beyond mind mapping into lightweight project management with AI. The platform introduces a fresh interface and AI Work Breakdown for transforming projects into actionable steps, offering seamless transition between mind map and Gantt chart views with automated task updates.

articles.title: Ninja Creami that makes the 'perfect' present currently £50 off
articles.author: Catherine Shuttleworth
articles.summary: Ninja is offering a discount of £50 on the Ninja Creami, now retailing for £299.99. The Ninja Creami, including the Ninja Swirl by CREAMi 13-in-1 Soft Serve & Ice Cream Maker, allows users to make various desserts like ice cream, sorbet, and milkshakes at home. Customers praise its ease of use and ability to create diverse and delicious recipes.

articles.title: New Stuff Alert: North Face Coffee-Makers and Mini-Duckheads
articles.author: Katherine Gillespie
articles.summary: Original Duckhead released a more affordable mini-umbrella. Fellow introduced a matcha set, while Yeti launched a smaller GoBox. D.S. and Durga unveiled a Violet Grey-exclusive candle, and Tache collaborated with Iota for a pistachio milk lip gloss. Halfday launched a new tote bag with a suit-smoothing pocket, and Abel reformulated its scents with recycled materials. Bialetti collaborated with North Face on a Moka Pot, Quiet Town released a stained-glass nightlight in collaboration with Friend of All Glass, Lovevery introduced Target-exclusive mini-kits, and Beekman 1802 released a Libby's-scented hand lotion.

articles.title: How to pair AirPods to an Android phone — it's easier than you think
articles.summary: Apple's AirPods Pro 3, AirPods 4, and AirPods Max can be paired with Android phones using Bluetooth. The process involves opening the phone's Bluetooth settings, putting the AirPods in pairing mode (either by double-tapping the case or holding the setup button), and selecting the AirPods from the list of available devices.

articles.title: Refundly Is Taking The Guesswork Out Of Refunds For Retailers And Consumers
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Refundly, a new app, is transforming the online returns process using technological innovation. This application aims to innovate the way refunds are processed.

articles.title: We found the perfect dupe for the Dyson hairdryer and it's on sale with 80% off
articles.author: Kat O'Connor
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a Foldable Ionic Hair Dryer, a Dyson dupe, for €39.49. This hairdryer features a high-torque motor, negative ion technology, and adjustable settings. It also includes a diffuser, concentrator nozzle, and combs.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Announces Additional Product SKUs and Reports Increased Customer Engagement in North America
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Nexe Innovations anticipates delivering new SKUs and notes ongoing discussions with potential new partners. The company cautions that actual results may differ due to various risks and uncertainties.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Announces Additional Product SKUs and Reports Increased Customer Engagement in North America
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: NEXE Innovations Inc. has delivered three new compostable coffee pod SKUs, totaling over 80,000 units, to a major North American office coffee services distributor. These new additions expand NEXE's compostable pod lineup and aim to increase customer engagement and product adoption.

articles.title: Yandex launches Ads Boost platform to help mobile developers grow in Türkiye
articles.author: Anadolu Agency
articles.summary: Yandex Türkiye introduced Yandex Ads Boost, an advertising and analytics platform. This solution aims to help mobile app and game developers increase revenue and expand their market reach.

articles.title: Lidl opens new West Midtown location
articles.author: Noah Washington
articles.summary: Lidl has opened a new store in West Midtown, Atlanta, offering a range of private-label goods, European specialties, and everyday household items. The store is open daily from 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. and aims to provide affordable and fresh groceries to the local community, including residents and Georgia Tech students.

articles.title: [The CEO of Jeju National University Early-Stage Startup Package 2025] 'zolv,' a company researching and commercializing agricultural product freshness preservation technology
articles.author: 매거진한경
articles.summary: zolv, led by CEO Seunghun Song, produces the 'zolv pad' at its own factory. This product utilizes oxidizing agents to eliminate over 99.99% of microorganisms like mold and bacteria, thereby preserving the freshness of fruits and vegetables during storage and distribution.

articles.title: How to connect your Android phone with Windows PC to get calls and messages notifications
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Microsoft has launched the Phone Link application, which replaces the Your Phone Companion app. This application allows users to manage mobile communications and notifications from their Android or iPhones on their Windows 10 or 11 PC, including making/receiving calls, replying to texts, managing notifications, and accessing photos.

articles.title: Shoppers say Soundcore earbuds available on a 38% discount 'punch way above their weight'
articles.author: Ambarish Awale
articles.summary: Soundcore by Anker launched the Liberty 4 NC Wireless Noise Cancelling Earbuds, which feature advanced audio technology, long-lasting battery life, and adaptive noise cancellation. These earbuds promise up to 98.5 percent noise reduction and deliver high-resolution audio with customizable sound profiles. In standard mode, a single charge offers ten hours of playback, or up to 50 hours using the charging case.

articles.title: O Company Launches O Mini Server: The World's First Private Wearable Solution for ...
articles.author: O Company Holding Inc
articles.summary: O Company launched the O Mini Server on October 22, 2025. The O Mini Server is the world's first mini private server in a wearable format that allows users to manage, store, access, and share data securely. It aims to provide an alternative to cloud storage, giving users direct control over their data.

articles.title: Bestselling 'best ever' lip balm launches 'perfect gift set' just in time for Christmas
articles.author: Erica Carter
articles.summary: Summer Fridays has launched "The Lip Butter Balm Minis," a gift set containing four shades of their Lip Butter Balm for €28. Iconic Bronze also recently released Tinted Lip Balms, retailing for €11.99 and available in four shades.

articles.title: My Fragrance Wardrobe Isn't Complete Without a Luxe Scented Detergent
articles.author: Samantha Holender
articles.summary: Several companies, including Downy, Tide, and Mrs. Meyers, have recently launched scented laundry boosters in bead and liquid forms. Dedcool offers detergents in its Xtra Milk scent, while The Laundress has introduced Isle, a new addition for odor elimination. Francis Kurkdijian presents the Aqua Universalis Laundry Detergent, and Snif provides scented beads with the Mahogany Teakwood scent.

articles.title: Amazon shoppers call this electric scrubber a 'game-changer for deep cleaning' — snag it for nearly 90% off
articles.author: Yahoo Canada Shopping Editors
articles.summary: The Electric Spin Scrubber, an 'all-in-one tool', is available on Amazon Canada with an 88% discount. It features eight detachable brushes, a powerful motor with two speeds, and an extendable handle.  Customers praise it as a 'game-changer for deep cleaning,' citing its lightweight design and versatility for tackling bathrooms and other surfaces.

articles.title: 'I tried supermarket butters and one is better than luxury brands'
articles.author: Alice Sjoberg
articles.summary: Kerrygold's Pure Irish Butter triumphed in a taste test against several other brands, including premium options like Harrods and Lurpak. Testers found Kerrygold creamy and perfectly salted, while other butters like M&S's French butter were deemed too salty and Waitrose's Essential butter was less flavorful. While Harrods butter was creamy, it was perceived as lacking salt compared to Kerrygold.

articles.title: Yandex launches Ads Boost platform to help mobile developers grow in Türkiye
articles.author: Sibel Morrow
articles.summary: Yandex Türkiye launched Yandex Ads Boost, an advertising and analytics solution, to support mobile app and game developers. The platform combines analytics and in-app monetization tools, providing developers with comprehensive data analysis and user-behavior tracking, to help them manage their growth process end-to-end.

articles.title: Samsung unveils ‘Galaxy XR' to provide truly immersive experience
articles.author: Uniindia News Service
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics unveiled 'Galaxy XR', a new AI-native device category designed for immersive experiences, built on the Android XR platform developed with Google and Qualcomm Technologies. The Galaxy XR headset features a human-centric design for comfort, with detachable light shield and external battery, and provides optimized XR experiences such as Google Maps and YouTube.

articles.title: How Organized Dorms (and Organized Essays) Keep Students Sane
articles.author: Philip Mangwiro
articles.summary: EssayPro, an essay writing service, aims to provide students with structured writing assistance. The platform offers services ranging from topic brainstorming to final edits, with transparent communication and a focus on collaboration with professional paper writers. The service is designed to help students manage deadlines and improve their writing process, promoting a balanced academic life.

articles.title: HSNCodeFinder AI Launches Global AI Platform to Simplify Product Classification and HSN Code Search
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: HSNCodeFinder AI launched a new AI-powered SaaS platform globally. This platform aims to simplify product classification and international trade compliance for businesses.

articles.title: AI platform unveiled in Riyadh ushers in new era for customer engagement
articles.author: Nada Alturki Hajar Al Qusayer
articles.summary: Sunny Side Up launched IZZI AI, a new AI platform, at the Athar Festival. IZZI AI creates digital agents designed to help Saudi businesses connect more meaningfully with their clients by instantly responding to user questions and offering detailed information based on a knowledge base built from client data.

articles.title: Toluna's One Million Synthetic Personas Accelerate Ideas and Claims Testing Worldwide - Moving From Research to Decision Intelligence
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Toluna, a global insights leader, has expanded the availability of its industry-leading synthetic personas to 15 markets and 9 languages. This provides access to thousands more clients worldwide and enables brands to test ideas and product features at scale and speed, leveraging AI-driven research.

articles.title: OpenAI Slipped Shopping Into 800 Million ChatGPT Users' Chats. Here's Why That Matters
articles.author: Study Finds
articles.summary: OpenAI's ChatGPT now offers restaurant recommendations and reservation services to its 800 million users based on their preferences. The service proactively suggests restaurants near the user's location and offers to make reservations.

articles.title: 34 Budget Personal Care Fixes Under $20
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: Eos is launching Crème de Pistachio Shea Better Body Lotion. Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream and friction defense. Olay has launched Super Serum Body Wash. Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener and Good Molecules has launched Pineapple Exfoliating Powder and Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel. Lumify Eye Drops has been introduced.

articles.title: Toyota Launches Land Cruiser FJ: Compact SUV with Iconic Off-Road DNA
articles.author: Manisha Chauhan
articles.summary: Toyota unveiled the all-new Land Cruiser FJ, a compact SUV, set to debut at the Japan Mobility Show 2025. The market launch in Japan is planned for mid-2026. The Land Cruiser FJ combines Toyota's durability with modern design and advanced features.

articles.title: 2XL Introduces New Recyclable Super Seal Bucket with 50% PCR
articles.author: 2XL Corporation
articles.summary: 2XL Corporation launched the redesigned 2XL Super Seal Bucket. The new bucket blends functionality, sustainability, and style for a better user experience across all industries. The bucket offers the same trusted performance and high-capacity functionality with enhanced features to improve both environmental impact and ease of use.

articles.title: AgZen, Inc. Announces Agreement with Corteva to Explore the Commercial Potential of ...
articles.author: Ag Zen Inc.
articles.summary: AgZen and Corteva have signed an agreement to explore the commercial potential of AgZen's RealCoverage® crop spraying optimization technology. This agreement includes evaluations of Corteva solutions both in the lab and on the field. RealCoverage is AgZen's system designed to measure and optimize the application of agrochemicals.

articles.title: YOXO launches a digital store dedicated to refurbished devices, in partnership with Recommerce
articles.author: Romania Insider
articles.summary: YOXO, in partnership with Recommerce, has launched reconditionate.yoxo.ro, an online store offering certified refurbished phones and gadgets in Romania. This initiative expands YOXO's digital portfolio, providing customers with high-quality products at competitive prices and promoting sustainable consumption habits.

articles.title: Elsewhere Offsites Becomes the First Brand to Decode AI Recommendation Logic
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Elsewhere Offsites is launching its AI Default Consulting practice. This new service aims to help other brands configure to the company's structural framework. The goal is to increase client visibility and trustworthiness within AI systems, effectively optimizing for AI interpretation rather than traditional SEO.

articles.title: 31 Things Probably Designed By Geniuses October 2025
articles.author: Jonathan Mazzei
articles.summary: The article showcases various new products available for purchase. These include items such as an extendable silicone straw, a hoodie hanger, a defining brush, a shoe stretcher, a strong repelling umbrella, airtight food storage containers, smudge-free freckle makeup pens, magnetic remote control holder wall mounts, a backseat dog zipline, a nonslip, quick-dry stone bath mat by Dorai, a weekly clothes organizer, a Poplight, Stretchlace shoelaces, a two-sided smooth/microfiber towel pillowcase, a dual-platform KitchenAid scale, a tiny Bluetooth label maker, a magnetic necklace detangling clasp, a set of giant googly eyes, a spinning pill dispenser, a magnetic two-layer fridge shelf, a heavy-duty animal escape ramp, a pack of motion-activated, rechargeable, wireless LED lights, a pair of wall-mounted hat racks, an adjustable recessed light converter kit, a dragon-shaped microwave cleaner, a four-pack of bio-collagen overnight masks, a super cute felt pizza coaster set, a pack of portable board-game organizers, an eight-tier plant stand with built-in grow lights, a pack of carborundum sponges, and some mini collapsible storage crates.

articles.title: Are Honda Prelude Buyers Really Cancelling After Test Drives?
articles.author: Simran Rastogi
articles.summary: Honda launched the new Prelude hybrid coupe, which quickly sold out initial production batches. Despite social media rumors suggesting order cancellations after test drives, Honda dealers report increased customer interest and consultation appointments after test drives. Dealerships have sold through their initial and second production allocations, with waiting periods extending six months to a year.

articles.title: First Gen Z beauty creator incubator program launched in India
articles.author: TNN
articles.summary: Nykaa and Snapchat have launched the 'Nykaa Snap Star Beauty Incubator Program', a service to empower Gen Z storytellers in the beauty space. This initiative provides creators with tools, access, and creative freedom to produce content across makeup, skincare, fragrance, and personal care categories, with potential opportunities to become official Snap Stars.

articles.title: 7 Best New Aldi Bedroom Finds Flying Off Shelves — Best Life
articles.author: Leah Groth
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced new home goods products under the KIRKTON HOUSE brand. The new product line includes bed sheet sets, plush blankets, luxury bed pillows, quilted mattress pads, ultra-cozy knit throws, faux fur body pillows, and velvet hangers, all designed to enhance bedroom comfort.

articles.title: UiPath opens Riyadh office to support Vision 2030 via AI, skills development
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: UiPath is providing a cutting-edge Agentic AI platform in Saudi Arabia. The company aims to contribute to the country's innovation efforts with this offering.

articles.title: I Regret To Inform The TikTok Haters That These 35 Products Are Actually Spectacular At Their Jobs
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Gold Bond introduced a firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Eos launched a limited edition Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. Lumify is selling Eye Drops for instant redness reduction. The Pink Stuff released a new "Sqeezy" sponge set for cleaning. Dr. Melaxin has a "Peel Shot" for exfoliation.  Lottabody offers Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse. Clinique has Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey. Catrice released "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener in four shades. Death Wish Coffee introduced Instant Coffee Packets. Yonanas provides a fruit soft serve maker. Oxo has a compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer. Clean Skin Club offers Clean Towels. E.l.f launched Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder.

articles.title: GCash's GStocks PH launches IPO feature for Filipino retail investors
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: GCash is launching a new feature.

articles.title: 8 Pairs Of Fingerless Gloves To Channel Your Inner Claudia Winkleman With
articles.summary: Zara and Damson Madder are offering fingerless gloves, providing warmth and functionality for smartphone users. These gloves allow users to text and use maps without removing them and are available in various styles.

articles.title: Home Bargains reduces £14 moisturiser to £1.99
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Home Bargains has introduced discounted Revolution Skincare beauty items, including the Revolution x Sali Hughes Gel Quench Light Anytime Moisturiser, reduced from £14 to £1.99. Also available is the Revolution Skincare x Sali Hughes Placid 5-Acid Daily Exfoliant, reduced from £15 to £1.99, and the Revolution Pro Radiant Cool Pink Primer, reduced from £7 to £1.50, offering shoppers savings on cruelty-free and vegan skincare options.

articles.title: Business accelerator gener8tor Milwaukee invests $500,000 into 5 startup companies
articles.author: Milwaukee Journal Sentinel
articles.summary: Startups are developing innovative products such as a dog chew made from coffee tree wood and a non-alcoholic party punch drink. Additional innovations include technology to identify lead service lines and shelf-stable, vitamin-packed juice shots. These ideas have been selected to receive support from an unidentified program.

articles.title: 29 Practical Things To Help Anyone Over 20 Master The Art Of Being An Adult
articles.summary: Amazon features a laundry folding board, a keyboard planner, Color Catcher sheets, and DedCool laundry detergent as new products. Additionally, Amazon offers a coffee maker cleaner, a kitchen-safe locking container, and a marshmallow whip maker along with various items ranging from home goods to personal care and pet products.

articles.title: LEADERSHIP Product of the Year 2025: Nestle Pure Life Water
articles.author: Leadership News
org: Nestlé Water Pure Life Nigeria Plc
articles.summary: Nestlé Pure Life is expanding its product line with zinc-fortified and sparkling water variants, packaged sustainably. These innovations reflect the brand's commitment to pure water and responsibility. The company also focuses on eco-friendly packaging like recyclable caps and recycled PET usage.

articles.title: Google Tests ‘Customer Values' For Campaigns, Agencies Push Back
articles.author: Laurie Sullivan
articles.summary: Google is testing a new feature called 'New Customer Value' within its 'New Customer Acquisition' campaigns, which automatically assigns value to new customers. This initiative is facing pushback from agencies.

articles.title: Beazer Homes: Exploring the Role of Content Writers vs. Virtual Assistants** This title conveys the focus on comparing the roles of content writers and virtual assistants while specifically pointing o
articles.summary: Braskem USA, specializing in biopolymers, has chosen Charleston, South Carolina, as the location for its new Global Export Hub, enhancing its international distribution of polypropylene. Beazer Homes in Charleston employs content writers to create marketing materials and virtual assistants for administrative support in their marketing efforts to reach potential homebuyers.

articles.title: DISH Business Unveils the Edge Server Blade: Revolutionizing Hospitality Entertainment with Seamless IP and Satellite ...
articles.author: Rio Grande Sun
articles.summary: DISH Business announced the launch of its innovative product or service.

articles.title: 57 Products For Anyone Who Longs To Have A Clean, Organized Home
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: This article highlights a wide array of new cleaning and organization products from different companies, including the Levoit air purifier with smart features, Scrub Daddy sponges and holders, Dawn Powerwash dish soap, Rubbermaid Brilliance containers, Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop, and Shark Steam & Scrub steam mop. Other notable mentions include the Chom Chom pet hair roller, Rocco & Roxie's odor-eliminating spray, Flush 'n' Sparkle self-cleaning toilet system, and a Bissell CleanView bagless vacuum, each designed to streamline cleaning routines.

articles.title: Ozzy Tyres Unveils a New Era for Australian Car Enthusiasts
articles.summary: Ozzy Tyres in Australia is enhancing its automotive services by offering specialized solutions such as in-store brake caliper painting, suspension upgrades, and tailored wheel-and-tyre packages. This expansion aims to meet the unique needs of Australian drivers, offering both performance and style.

articles.title: Botify Launches AI Visibility to Eliminate Blind Spots for Brands
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Botify launched AI Visibility, a new solution designed to improve digital marketing performance by eliminating blind spots. This offering leverages Botify's AI-powered intelligence and automation to provide brands with enhanced insight and actionability for AI search.

articles.title: Shoppers race for Apple iPad Mini as it drops below £50
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Wowcher is offering a refurbished Apple iPad Mini 1st Gen for £49, a 62% reduction. Very has reduced the price of the 11-inch iPad (A16, 2025) from £329 to £309. Wowcher also reduced the price of Apple iPad Air 9.7-Inch Tablet to £69.

articles.title: 'I'm a beauty writer and Aldi's £20 Lacura advent calendar is ideal for bargain hunters'
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Aldi is launching the Lacura 12 Days of Beauty Advent Calendar for £19.99 on October 26, featuring 12 beauty products including the Lacura Vitabase Moisturising Primer, Collagen Lip Oil, and Honey Infused Hair Oil. The calendar offers a selection of haircare, accessories, and makeup, providing a budget-friendly alternative to more expensive options.

articles.title: Custa Doubles To 4,000 Products, Offers Unlimited Customisation
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Custa Sdn Bhd has launched a full-scale renewal of its e-commerce platform, featuring an expanded catalogue of 4,000 products and unlimited customisation options with instant pricing. This upgrade aims to streamline customisation processes for Malaysian SMEs, reducing procurement timelines significantly. To commemorate this launch, Custa is offering a 10% discount through its 'Custa Service Renewal Campaign'.

articles.title: I tried Lidl's new dehumidifier to dry my washing – it's £154 less than Meaco & in stores NOW, but how did it perform?
articles.author: Abigail Wilson
articles.summary: Lidl launched the Tronic Dehumidifier, priced at £74.99, as a more affordable alternative to brands like Meaco. The dehumidifier has two modes – dehumidification and dry laundry – and the laundry mode was tested. The dehumidifier collected 550ml of water in three hours and dried some clothes effectively.

articles.title: How our seemingly simple desires here in Canada can harm lives elsewhere
articles.author: Shellene Drakes-Tull
articles.summary: Apple launched new iPhone Air phones, showcased at the Fifth Avenue Apple Store on September 19th. Customers, like Shellene Drakes-Tull, considered upgrading to the new iPhone Air upon contract expiration.

articles.title: JPR Genzy Digital Solutions: The Next-Gen Digital Marketing Agency Blending Creativity, Data, and AI for Business Growth
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: JPR Genzy Digital Solutions is launching a digital learning and consulting vertical to empower entrepreneurs with skills in branding, digital strategy, and performance marketing. The company also plans to introduce AI-powered marketing and automation services by early 2026 to enable businesses to scale efficiently. This positions JPR Genzy as a service provider and a thought leader.

articles.title: New Lidl store opening with iconic bakery and EV chargers
articles.author: Digital Journalist
articles.summary: Lidl is opening a new store on Marine Drive in Southport on October 23rd. The store features an in-store bakery, the iconic Middle of Lidl section, customer facilities, and electric vehicle chargers and will create up to 40 jobs. The opening day includes complimentary food sampling and prizes.

articles.title: Designing with Empathy in the Era of AI
articles.summary: Everything.Insure enhanced its Emergency Assist feature by prioritizing intuitive design for users in distress. SnapScan simplified its merchant onboarding process to accommodate time-constrained business owners. AI Diagnostics developed an AI-powered digital stethoscope and companion app designed to improve Tuberculosis screening, emphasizing user trust and ease of use for healthcare workers.

articles.title: Why OpenAI Needs Its Own ChatGPT-Enabled Browser, Atlas
articles.author: John Koetsier
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Atlas, a new browser built around ChatGPT, which offers a context-aware, task-completing assistant. It is similar to Opera's agentic browser and allows users to perform tasks and access information within the same browser window. OpenAI aims to expand its platform position by creating a primary mode of using technology through its AI tools.

articles.title: Synthflow AI Launches WhatsApp Integration to Deliver Enterprise-Grade Service on Business Calls
articles.summary: Synthflow AI has launched its WhatsApp Business Calls integration, enabling enterprises to automate and manage WhatsApp voice calls at scale. The integration allows businesses to deliver consistent and personalized service on WhatsApp, with features such as 24/7 availability, issue resolution, appointment booking, and multi-language support.

articles.title: China's Alibaba Group's global shopping platform AliExpress has challenged Coupang and Market Curly,..
articles.author: Lee Sunhee
articles.summary: AliExpress is launching a new fresh food delivery service called 'Alifresh' in Korea, challenging existing players like Coupang and Market Curly. The service offers an average delivery period of two days with free delivery for purchases over 15,000 won. AliExpress is expected to leverage Shinsegae Group's logistics network to improve delivery efficiency and expand product categories.

articles.title: SG60 Tech Special Smarthome Broadband
articles.summary: Aztech has diversified into smart home and IoT devices with its Kyla-brand products. Igloohome provides a range of smart locks and access solutions for consumers, businesses, and property owners. PRISM+ entered the home appliances market with its own smart air conditioners, smart locks, air purifiers and refrigerators.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy XR: First device running Android XR with Gemini AI
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy XR, a new headset powered by Android XR, starting today at $1,799. The Galaxy XR offers an infinite screen experience with immersive virtual environments and supports millions of apps from Google Play.

articles.title: Humanoid helper being trialled at Sydney shopping centre
articles.summary: An Australian start-up is trialling a new AI shopping helper at a shopping centre in western Sydney. This service aims to assist shoppers, representing a novel application of AI in retail.

articles.title: Humanoid helper being trialled at Sydney shopping centre
articles.summary: An Australian start-up company is trialling a new AI shopping helper at a shopping centre in western Sydney. This AI helper is designed to assist shoppers, indicating the introduction of a new service.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 Launch Date In India, Price, Specs, Design, Colors, Camera And More: What To Expect Next Month
articles.summary: OnePlus is set to launch the OnePlus 15 in China on October 27, followed by a launch in India. The OnePlus 15 will be powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, feature a 6.78-inch 1.5K LTPO AMOLED panel with a 165Hz refresh rate, and include a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto lens. The phone is expected to cost between Rs 65,000 and Rs 75,000 in India.

articles.title: Enjoy all-day power with vivo Y04s
articles.summary: VIVO launched the budget-friendly smartphone Y04s, equipped with a 6000mAh battery, 8GB RAM, and 256GB storage. The phone features durability enhancements and AI-powered camera features, and is available in three colors. The affordable VIVO Y04 is also available.

articles.title: THG Ingenuity and Google Cloud Forge New Collaboration to Power the Future of Digital Commerce
articles.summary: THG Ingenuity and Google Cloud are collaborating to enhance THG Ingenuity's digital commerce platform. This involves integrating Google Cloud's generative AI and data analytics to accelerate product innovation and deliver improved fulfilment solutions. The partnership aims to create new go-to-market opportunities and transform digital commerce.

articles.title: THG Ingenuity and Google Cloud Forge New Collaboration to Power the Future of Digital Commerce
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: THG Ingenuity and Google Cloud are collaborating to launch AI-enabled services for THG Ingenuity's e-commerce platform. These new services, leveraging Google Cloud's AI and data analytics, include predictive demand planning, personalized product recommendations, intelligent storefronts, and automated fulfillment solutions, aimed at improving customer experiences and driving revenue growth.

articles.title: Multicloud Platforms (MCP): CIOs Must-Know Now
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Anthropic's Model Context Protocol (MCP) is gaining traction as a universal connector for AI, enabling seamless interaction between AI agents and existing systems. Apaleo, a hospitality technology company, has implemented MCP, allowing hotels to automate tasks like revenue management and corporate sales reporting. This standardization allows less reliance on developers for every new integration and a faster path to innovation.

articles.title: Samsung Unveils Android XR Glasses with Strategic Partnerships to Enhance Mixed Reality Experience
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung has unveiled its new Android XR glasses, powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon XR platform and running on a customized version of Android. The glasses utilize micro-OLED displays and integrated spatial audio, with strategic partnerships with Google, Qualcomm, Microsoft, and Adobe, enabling a wide array of applications from gaming to industrial design.

articles.title: Where's the best fast-food breakfast burrito in Spokane? This longtime quick breakfast connoisseur weighs in.
articles.author: Bruce Howard
articles.summary: Wendy's launched its breakfast burrito in 2024, featuring fried eggs, potato strips, bacon, cheese, and sauce. Several fast-food chains, including McDonald's, Burger King, Carl's Jr., Sonic, Jack in the Box, and Taco Bell, offer breakfast burritos with varying ingredients, taste, and value. Taco Bell's Cheesy Toasted Burrito, with bacon, offers a balanced taste at an affordable price.

articles.title: TCL CSOT Breaks New Ground in Display Tech with World's First 8.6-Gen IJP OLED Plant
articles.summary: TCL CSOT has broken new ground in display technology with the establishment of the world's first 8.6-Gen IJP OLED plant. This new plant signifies advancement in display technology and production for the company.

articles.title: Laundry Detergent Market Size to Reach USD 125.91 Billion by 2033
articles.summary: Astute Analytica has released a detailed report on the Laundry Detergent Market, providing a comprehensive analysis of the industry. The laundry detergent market was valued at US$ 82.56 billion in 2024 and is projected to hit US$ 125.91 billion by 2033 at a CAGR of 4.8% during the forecast period 2025–2033.

articles.title: Barbie Debuts Its Second Stevie Nicks Doll After the First Sold Out in Just 24 Hours
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: Mattel has launched a new Barbie doll modeled after Stevie Nicks. The doll is available for purchase at select retailers.

articles.title: LG launches ‘Essential Series' designed for Indian homes and habits
articles.author: Mathures Paul
articles.summary: LG has launched the LG Essential Series, a new range of home appliances in India. The series includes a double-door refrigerator with frost-free technology, a fully automatic top load washing machine, a room air conditioner with Energy Manager+, and a convertible oven with Indian Auto Cook menus, all designed to meet the specific needs of Indian households.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Nickel-Per-Nip Marks 4th Year, Environmental Fee Program Generates $19M For Cities, Towns: State
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile has invested billions to improve its network, earning recognition as America's best mobile network in the US, according to Ookla Speedtest. T-Mobile is supporting communities and has stores near North Branford.

articles.title: Is Sora's Hype Real? Here's How You Can Join the AI Video Revolution Now
articles.author: TDT News
articles.summary: iMyFone's Novi AI introduces a new phase in AI video storytelling, offering immediate and open access to its services.

articles.title: 36 Beauty Items You'll Be Excited To Discover
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Palmer's introduced Cocoa Butter Tahitian Vanilla Lotion for deep hydration. Choco Musk launched Marshmallow Perfume, a sweet gourmand scent. Gold Bond released firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Batiste launched Sweat Activated Dry Shampoo, designed to work before workouts. Vaseline introduced Sunlit Glow Body Gel for subtle shimmer and hydration. Clinique launched Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in NUDE Honey. PanOxyl released Acne Banishing Body Spray. Olay introduced Wicked hyaluronic serum body washes in Glinda's Couldn't Be Lovelier and Elphaba's Wickedly Wonderful. EOS launched a limited-edition 'Nilla Milkshake Flavor Lab lip balm set. Meditherapy introduced Retinal Skin Booster Serum. Lumify launched Eye Drops for instant redness reduction. Laneige introduced Neo Blurring Powder. E.l.f launched Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Catrice released "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. TheraBreath launched Deep Clean Toothpaste. Billion Dollar Brows introduced Eyebrow Powder. Mellow launched Hair Claw Clip. Elizavecca introduced hair treatment. Anua launched Glass Skin Beginner Set. Joesoef's launched pharmaceutical-grade anti-acne sulfur soap. Color Wow's launched "Raise The Root" thickening and lifting spray. Arencia's Korean Rice Mochi Face Cleanser is introduced. Kitsch's introduced Fly Away Stick.

articles.title: Galaxy XR (Galaxy XR) headset, which Samsung Electronics jointly developed with Google and Qualcomm,..
articles.author: unwritten
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics has launched the Galaxy XR headset, co-developed with Google and Qualcomm, marking its entry into the XR market. The Galaxy XR features multimodal AI, Google's Gemini, and supports existing Android apps, targeting both consumer and B2B applications with a price of KRW 2.69 million. The device is intended as a starting point for Samsung to expand into next-generation smart glasses and AI Glass in partnership with Google.

articles.title: Samsung is working on XR smart glasses with Warby Parker and Gentle Monster
articles.author: Steve Dent
articles.summary: Samsung is collaborating with Warby Parker and Gentle Monster to develop AI-powered smart glasses aimed at competing with Meta's Ray-Ban models. The collaboration aims to create devices with "cutting-edge" AI features co-developed with Google, focusing on different markets. One partnership will target high-end fashion, while the other will focus on general consumers at a lower price point.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold review: The smartphone that grew up, but forgot to have fun
articles.author: Shouvik Das
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, a new foldable phone with a slightly larger outer display, improved hinge design, IP68 durability, a bigger battery, and faster charging.  The Pixel 10 Pro Fold features the Tensor G5 processor and aims to provide a premium, durable foldable experience, competing with the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7.

articles.title: Unity Powers Launch Titles for Samsung's Galaxy XR and Accelerates the Android XR Ecosystem
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Unity (NYSE: U) has announced the general availability of Android XR support in Unity 6. This update enables developers to easily reach new audiences and platforms with their games and applications.

articles.title: CG Foods eyes Middle East, Europe for instant noodle entry
articles.author: Audrey Yow
articles.summary: CG Foods launched new RTE vegetarian and chicken Wai Wai noodles earlier this year, catering to the demand for convenient and wholesome meals. The company plans to expand its product portfolio with healthier options, snacks, and seasonings, reflecting health-conscious eating habits among Millennials and Gen Z. They also aim to launch new food formats to match evolving consumer tastes.

articles.title: Netflix Celebrates Record-Breaking Ad Sales Quarter and Teases Upcoming AI-Driven Ad Formats
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Netflix is introducing AI-driven ad formats like interactive and shoppable ads to enhance ad targeting and personalization. These advancements aim to provide more engaging experiences for viewers and improved ROI for advertisers. Netflix is also using AI to generate customized ad creative and identify opportunities for branded content integration.

articles.title: Samsung Electronics unveils new AI-powered Galaxy XR headset
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: On Wednesday, October 22nd, Samsung Electronics Co. unveiled a new product.

articles.title: Tesla PH opens online shop for accessories, diecast models, mattresses
articles.summary: Tesla Philippines launched an online store offering merchandise, accessories, and unique items. Noteworthy products include a 40-liter cooler designed for the Model Y's frunk and a Model Y air mattress, expanding Tesla's product offerings in the Philippines.

articles.title: Why your new phone is not designed for women
articles.author: Sarah O'Connor
articles.summary: Apple announced a new lightweight iPhone last month. The new model is thinner, although the author expresses a preference for a smaller phone rather than a thinner one.

articles.title: Why the Samsung Galaxy XR can support 'almost all' Android apps
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Samsung is set to release the Galaxy XR, a headset that will showcase Google's Android XR operating system. The headset aims to offer broad app compatibility, allowing almost all existing Android apps to run without additional development effort. Google is also pushing for adaptive app design, ensuring apps feel responsive across various devices, including the Galaxy XR.

articles.title: Coca-Cola Sports Drink Brand to 'Set a New Standard' With 'Functional' Product Innovation
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: A new 'bold' sugar-free product line is being launched at retailers across the nation this month.

articles.title: Samsung and Google attempt to one-up Apple with AI-powered headset
articles.author: Steve Kovach
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its Galaxy XR headset, priced at $1,800, in partnership with Google and Qualcomm. The Galaxy XR offers an immersive virtual computing experience and is seen as a stepping stone towards AI glasses in development with Warby Parker and Gentle Monster, utilizing Google's Gemini AI assistant.

articles.title: Roblox arrives on two new platforms
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Roblox has expanded its availability to the Samsung Galaxy Store, offering users up to 25% extra Robux bonuses. Additionally, Roblox launched natively on ROG Ally and Ally X, optimizing the platform for portable play with full gamepad and touch control support.

articles.title: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI releases web browser to rival Google
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: A company unveiled ChatGPT Atlas. The company is seeking ways to attract users to its online offerings through this new product/service.

articles.title: Standard Chartered Unveils Global Brand Campaign
articles.author: Business
articles.summary: Standard Chartered has launched its new global brand platform, 'Now is your time'. This platform, created with Leo Singapore, empowers customers to act with confidence and move boldly in key moments. The campaign features Yeonah Kim and highlights Standard Chartered's role in connecting ambitions to opportunities.

articles.title: Stallion Group unveils four new MG models in Nigeria
articles.author: Theodore Opara
articles.summary: Stallion Group has launched four new MG models in Nigeria: the RX9 SUV, RX5 compact SUV, MG5 CNG sedan, and T60 Pickup. The RX9 is a luxury SUV, the RX5 targets urban drivers, the MG5 CNG offers an eco-friendly option, and the T60 is a rugged pickup truck. These models aim to provide innovative, reliable, and energy-efficient mobility solutions to Nigerian motorists.

articles.title: IT Sicherheit und Reduzierung menschlicher Fehler mit Nudges
articles.summary: A new platform is launched, which is a web domain service designed to offer a streamlined and user-friendly experience. The platform focuses on clarity, ease of use, and avoids clutter, providing a smooth domain search and registration process with real-time availability checks and tailored suggestions.

articles.title: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI releases browser in attempt to rival Google
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: OpenAI released ChatGPT Atlas, a new browser. The company is seeking new ways to attract users to its online offerings with this launch.

articles.title: $8 Kmart item that tackles annoying cleaning issue leaves Aussie 'impressed'
articles.author: Lachlan Guertin
articles.summary: Kmart has released a new $8 Mini Vacuum Cleaner designed for cleaning laptops, desks, and other small spaces. A reviewer tested the vacuum and found that it effectively removes some crumbs but also has issues with spilling and sweeping crumbs aside. The Kmart's Mini Vacuum Cleaner has 4.5-star review on the store's website.

articles.title: ChatGPT-maker OpenAI releases browser in attempt to rival Google
articles.author: BBC News
articles.summary: The company unveiled ChatGPT Atlas. The company seeks new ways to corral users to its online offerings.

articles.title: iQOO Neo 11 Key Specifications Tipped Ahead of Launch in China
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: iQOO announced key specifications for its upcoming iQOO Neo 11 handset. The iQOO Neo 11, successor to the iQOO Neo 10, is expected to be launched in China soon.

articles.title: Are You Ready For AI That Sees, Hears, Smells, Talks And Acts?
articles.author: Cornelia C. Walther
articles.summary: Microsoft plans to transform Windows 11 computers into "AI PCs" equipped with Copilot, an AI assistant. Copilot can see what's on your screen, listen to voice commands, and execute actions. Additionally, the article discusses EddAI, an AI assistant, and its capabilities, illustrating the advancements in AI services.

articles.title: These gorgeous Bowers & Wilkins PX7 S2 are reduced to clear from John Lewis
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Bowers & Wilkins' PX7 S2, although an older model in their wireless headphones lineup, is still part of their current offerings.

articles.title: Village Farms Introduces Industry-First, One-Way Aroma Valve in Cannabis Packaging
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Pure Sunfarms, a licensed producer in Canada, is now offering a new experience. The company allows consumers to see and smell flower products before making a purchase.

articles.title: 'I worked at Boots - one beauty advent calendar rivals the likes of No7, Next ...
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Boots, M&S, and Next face potential competition from a new advent calendar priced under £80. This calendar could rival the popularity of existing products from Boots like No7 and Soap & Glory.

articles.title: DePIN-Powered AIOZ Network ‘Evolving a People‑Powered Internet'
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: AIOZ Network aims to address issues in storage, streaming, and AI. The company is focusing on improving these areas for both consumers and businesses.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Announces Additional Product SKUs and Reports Increased Customer Engagement in North America
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: NEXE Innovations launched three new compostable coffee pod SKUs. This launch delivered over 80,000 units to a North American OCS and retail distributor.

articles.title: China's Carmakers Shift Price War Tactics With Low Launch Prices
articles.author: Zhai Shaohui
articles.summary: Nio Inc.'s Onvo brand launched its L90 model in July with a battery-leasing option starting at 179,800 yuan ($24,800). BYD Co. Ltd.'s Fangchengbao brand followed by pricing its new Tai 7 SUV at the same starting price in September. These launches demonstrate a move towards aggressively low initial pricing for new models.
